borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Pruning of an Ash leaved Maple tree (T1) located on the Riverside, subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/323/5/04, by reduction in the canopy by 30% (2m in height and 2m in lateral spread), balance and shape; pruning of a Maple tree (T2) located on the Riverside adjacent to the lock, subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/323/5/04, by reduction in the  canopy by 30% (3m in height and 2m in lateral spread), balance and shape, and pruning away from the street light to give 1m clearance.; pruning of 3no. London Plane trees (T3, T4  T5) adjacent to the railway line, subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/323/5/04, by reduction in the canopies to previous points (5-6m in height and 3-4m in lateral spread); and pruning of a Sycamore tree (T6) adjacent to upper car park, subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/323/5/04, by reduction in the canopy to previous points (4m in height and 2m in lateral spread).
